SELECT re.id, o.order_num AS orderNum, CONCAT(area.province,area.city, area.district,IFNULL( l.mall,""),IFNULL( l.name,"")) AS local, m.machine_code AS machineCode, c.channel_name AS channelName, date_format( o.order_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS orderTime, o.order_price AS orderPrice, o.order_status AS orderStatus, re.user_id AS userId, i.`name` AS activityName, g.goods_name AS goodsName, o.order_type AS orderType, o.goods_status goodsStatus, date_format( o.pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS payTime,
re.refund_num AS refundNum, re.amount, re.status, date_format( re.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS createTime, date_format( re.audit_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS auditTime, date_format( re.refund_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS refundTime, re.audit_status AS auditStatus, re.audit_user AS auditUser, re.audit_reason AS auditReason, re.reason, re.refund_msg AS refundMsg, re.remark FROM inno72_order_refund re LEFT JOIN inno72_order o ON o.id = re.order_id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = o.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.`code`=l.area_code LEFT JOIN inno72_channel c ON c.id = o.channel_id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact i ON i.id = o.inno72_activity_id LEFT JOIN inno72_order_goods g ON g.order_id=re.order_id WHERE re.id =#{id}

select count(*) from inno72_order_refund
and
audit_status = 0
audit_status = 1 and status = 3
